scripts.android: yarn dynatrace-prod && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=prodDebug && yarn advice
scripts.ios: yarn dynatrace-prod && yarn boost-mmkv && ENVFILE=.env.prod react-native run-ios --scheme 'CompartamosFinanciera(prod)' --simulator='iPhone 14' && yarn advice
scripts.ios-dev: yarn dynatrace-dev && yarn boost-mmkv && ENVFILE=.env.dev react-native run-ios --scheme 'CompartamosFinanciera(dev)' --simulator='iPhone 15' && yarn advice
scripts.ios-qas: yarn dynatrace-qas && yarn boost-mmkv && ENVFILE=.env.qas react-native run-ios --scheme 'CompartamosFinanciera(qas)' --simulator='iPhone 14' && yarn advice
scripts.ios-qa: yarn dynatrace-qa && yarn boost-mmkv && ENVFILE=.env.qa react-native run-ios --scheme 'CompartamosFinanciera(qa)' --simulator='iPhone 15' && yarn advice
scripts.ios-prod: yarn dynatrace-prod && yarn boost-mmkv && ENVFILE=.env.prod react-native run-ios --scheme 'CompartamosFinanciera(prod)' --simulator='iPhone 14' && yarn advice
scripts.android-dev: yarn dynatrace-dev && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=devDebug --appIdSuffix=dev && yarn advice
scripts.android-qas: yarn dynatrace-qas && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=qasDebug --appIdSuffix=qas && yarn advice
scripts.android-qa: yarn dynatrace-qa && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=qaDebug --appIdSuffix=qa && yarn advice
scripts.android-prod: yarn dynatrace-prod && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=prodDebug && yarn advice
scripts.android-dev-release: yarn dynatrace-dev && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=devRelease --appIdSuffix=dev && yarn advice
scripts.android-qas-release: yarn dynatrace-qas && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=qasRelease --appIdSuffix=qas && yarn advice
scripts.android-qa-release: yarn dynatrace-qa && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=qaRelease --appIdSuffix=qa && yarn advice
scripts.android-prod-release: yarn dynatrace-prod && yarn boost-mmkv && react-native run-android --variant=prodRelease && yarn advice
scripts.android-dev-bundle: yarn dynatrace-dev && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDevDebug && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-qas-bundle: yarn dynatrace-qas && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew bundleQasDebug && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-qa-bundle: yarn dynatrace-qa && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew bundleQaDebug && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-prod-bundle: yarn dynatrace-prod && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProdDebug && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-dev-release-bundle: yarn dynatrace-dev && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDevRelease && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-qas-release-bundle: yarn dynatrace-qas && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew bundleQasRelease && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-qa-release-bundle: yarn dynatrace-qa && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew bundleQaRelease && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-prod-release-bundle: yarn dynatrace-prod && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProdRelease && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-dev-release-assemble: yarn dynatrace-dev && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleDevRelease && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-qas-release-assemble: yarn dynatrace-qas && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleQasRelease && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-qa-release-assemble: yarn dynatrace-qa && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleQaRelease && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.android-prod-release-assemble: yarn dynatrace-prod && yarn boost-mmkv && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleProdRelease && cd .. && yarn advice
scripts.postinstall: shx cp -r node_modules_configs/. node_modules && shx cp -r facephi_resources/selphid/. node_modules/@facephi/sdk-selphid-react-native && shx cp -r facephi_resources/selphi/. node_modules/@facephi/sdk-selphi-react-native && shx cp -r facephi_resources/core/. node_modules/@facephi/sdk-core-react-native
